fixes.name: Selected Metric Value
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As]),
    "Likes", SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day]),
    "Posts", SUM('test+'[Posts_Per_Day]),
    "Messages", SUM('test+'[Messages_Sent_Per_Day])
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the CASE statement to SWITCH using the parameter SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As]) and mapped each SUM(...) to SUM('test+'[ColumnName]) per the column/table mapping rules. The expression returns BLANK when no match is found.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter and uses aggregations (SUM), so it must be created as a measure.
